Question: HTML is used to structure a web page.
The tag is used to add video.
Every HTML page must start with <!DOCTYPE html>.

The

tag is used for paragraphs.
<div> is used to add CSS styles directly.
CSS controls the style and layout of a webpage.
margin adds space inside an element.
padding adds space inside the element.
display: flex; is used to create flexible layouts.
console.log() is used to show messages in the console.
JavaScript can run without a browser.
Variables are created using let, const, or var.
JavaScript is the same as Java.
